languages.text: "Да ясно, что синее. Но какое? Ты вот представляешь, как было бы под ним сидеть?"
"I know it's blue. But what's it like? Can you tell what it'd be like to sit under it?"
languages.original_text: "Да ясно, что синее. Но какое? Ты вот представляешь, как было бы под ним сидеть?"

traits.locale_text: "I know it's blue. But what is it like? Can you tell what it'd be like to be sitting under it?"
"I know it's blue. But what is it like? Can you tell what it'd be like to be sitting under it?"
"I know it's blue. But what's it like? Can you tell what it'd be like to sit under it?"
"I know it's blue. But what's it like? Can you tell what it'd be like to sit under it?"
"I know it's blue. But what's it like? Can you tell what it'd be like to sit under it?"

languages.text: “我知道天是蓝色的，但那又是什么样子的？可以告诉我，坐在蓝天之下是什么感觉吗？”
languages.original_text: "I know it's blue. But what's it like? Can you tell what it'd be like to sit under it?"

traits.locale_text: “我知道天是蓝色的，但那又是什么样子的？可以告诉我，坐在蓝天之下是什么感觉吗？”

languages.text: «Sé que es azul, pero ¿cómo es? ¿Cómo se siente sentarse bajo el cielo?».
languages.original_text: "I know it's blue. But what's it like? Can you tell what it'd be like to sit under it?"

traits.locale_text: «Sé que es azul, pero ¿cómo es? ¿Cómo se siente sentarse bajo el cielo?».

languages.text: 「青いのは知ってる。だけどそれってどんな感じだ？空の下に座ったら、どんな気持ちなんだろう？」
languages.original_text: "I know it's blue. But what's it like? Can you tell what it'd be like to sit under it?"

traits.locale_text: 「青いのは知ってる。だけどそれってどんな感じだ？空の下に座ったら、どんな気持ちなんだろう？」

languages.text: "Ich weiß, dass er blau ist. Aber wie fühlt er sich an? Wisst Ihr, wie es ist, darunter zu sitzen?"
languages.original_text: "I know it's blue. But what's it like? Can you tell what it'd be like to sit under it?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, dass er blau ist. Aber wie fühlt er sich an? Wisst Ihr, wie es ist, darunter zu sitzen?"

languages.text: « Je sais bien qu'il est bleu. Mais il est comment ? Tu peux me dire ce qu'on ressent, quand on s'assoit en dessous ? »
languages.original_text: "I know it's blue. But what's it like? Can you tell what it'd be like to sit under it?"

traits.locale_text: « Je sais bien qu'il est bleu. Mais il est comment ? Tu peux me dire ce qu'on ressent, quand on s'assoit en dessous ? »

languages.text: "Mavi olduğunu biliyorum ama nasıl bir şey yani? Altında oturmak nasıl bir şey, onu anlatabilir misin?"
languages.original_text: "I know it's blue. But what's it like? Can you tell what it'd be like to sit under it?"

traits.locale_text: "Mavi olduğunu biliyorum ama nasıl bir şey yani? Altında oturmak nasıl bir şey, onu anlatabilir misin?"
